metadata.title: CVE-2024-24862 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needs-triage').
